title: Blaeberry River - Thompson Falls Section
whats_it_like: 2 short canyons. The first is a gorgeous class 2 slot canyon, the second is a short but intense class 5 canyon followed by a bit of class 3 run out.
scouting_portaging: Fully scout both canyons before dropping in. You can get out to scout or hike out between the 2.

time.original: Half a day. It would only take ~30 minutes of paddling if you knew the run and that it was clear of wood, however, there is lots of wood movement, so expect to take half a day.
